content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. How much are you offering?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm looking for a minimum of 1500 Euro per month. That's a fair price for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand the location is excellent. However, 1500 Euro seems a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. Can we negotiate lower?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not willing to lower the price. This apartment is in high demand and I'm confident about the price I've set.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your time, but I'm not able to meet your asking price. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
